title: Crashing
body: My beta client says my password is wrong even after I changed it, even though it works on legacy client, and I crash everytime it tries to connect to game

replies.body: If I understand correctly, it sounds like you're having two different issues here.  The first is a login issue on the updated client, in which cause it sounds liek you might be connected to the wrong region.  Make sure you're reaching the NA region to accept your login credentials.  Regarding the game crash, I'll need some more informational like any errors you're getting.  Let me know what you're seeing so I can help!
I'm in the same boat for the crashes.
Now im in leaver buster restriction for the games that crashed after champ select
